fontmover(8) System Manager's Manual fontmover(8)

NAME

fontmover —
Mac OS X system font mover

SYNOPSIS

fontmover -d

DESCRIPTION

fontmover is a helper tool that moves fonts around on behalf of the font server.

Users should not run fontmover manually.

SEE ALSO

fontd(8)

HISTORY

The fontmover tool first appeared in MacOS X 10.6.
2009-09-01 Mac OS X
